product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Wing LTD Stand Up Paddle Board - 11'
long_description: Designed for small to medium sized paddlers, this versatile and easy-to-ride board has excellent glide that's ideal for fitness paddling, flatwater cruising, ocean touring, and recreational racing.
short_description: Designed for small to medium sized paddlers, this versatile and easy-to-ride board has excellent glide that's ideal for fitness paddling, flatwater cruising, ocean touring, and recreational racing.
